title: MLLM Pretraining with Event Semantic Structures

definitions.Structured Encoding: A method of encoding information in a structured format to facilitate better understanding and processing by AI systems.

summary: The slide discusses the challenge of structured encoding in the context of MLLM pretraining with event semantic structures. It includes a diagram illustrating the relationships between entities, agents, and instruments in an event, as well as an example caption describing a specific event.
